newsitem.title: FRANCE: Suez cancels news conference on 1996 results.
newsitem.headline: Suez cancels news conference on 1996 results.

text.p: Cie de Suez said it had cancelled a news conference on its 1996 results, scheduled for Wednesday, but would issue a statement after a board meeting on Tuesday.
A spokeswoman said the statement, due after 1600 GMT, would be on the results only.

She declined all further comment on talks Suez is holding with utilities group Lyonnaise des Eaux on a possible merger. The boards of Suez and Lyonnaise are due to hold a special meetings on April 11 to discuss a merger.
The Suez board meeting, due on Tuesday afternoon, was due to approve the 1996 results.
